task.summary: Default task
Standardize project structure, move sql code to resources directory.
Increase the effectiveness of stat increases and skill increases for Stun spell. Fixes #43
Fix libs folder reference
Add transaction.auto_close_session property to DB properties. Fix issue with removing infection crud inventory items on infection loss.
Remove minimum c3p0 connections. Add timeout for idle connections.
Increase the minimum damage of flame spell. Fixes #65
Reduce the max random effect and increase the base minimum static effect of treatment kits. Fixes #59
Log client logins and logouts to DB. Completes #37

Add comments to all abilities to assist with the external documentation efforts.
Also fixed bugs with the teleport spells and light spell.

Fix GetResearchCategoriesAvailableForCraftAndLevel.sql: Search for options at and below player research level instead of exactly at that level.
Refresh ability: Use enhancement affinity instead of holy.
Fix comment for Flame
Add details to the comment for Refresh
Add details to the Blind ability comment
Update database backup file.
Explain the Poison custom effect in the Poison spell comment.
Fix typo in the Piercing Toss comment
Update database backup.
Update module file. Added two versions: 1.69 (stable) and 1.74 (experimental)
Confer bonus inventory slots for STR upgrades. Fixes #71
Update module files. Update SQL script backup. Add 2DA files to git. Fixes #75
Regenerate ability: Increase amount to 2 at 3 wisdom modifier. decrease interval to 5 seconds at 6 wisdom modifier. Fixes #68
Fix some merge problems.
Update database backup and module. Remove old 1.69 versions.
Fix issues with adjusting stats due to NWNX changes.
Make the owner of custom effects the caster. This'll make it so that players get messages about damage and other effects in their combat log.
Clean up expired custom effects separately to fix an exception. Make custom effects expire if target is dead or invalid.
Add dialog swapping to the convo system to fix custom token issues.
Use a different conversation start method depending on where the dialog is called. Fixes #120
Add the sender name info when a radio message is sent.
Add light and heavy picks to the valid durability types list.
Revert the custom effect linking change to fix scheduler issues. Will revisit at a later point.
Fix issue which was wiping custom effects.
Update database backup and module - prior to EE release.
Update module - remove armor which was crashing players from the starting shop.
Update module - fix a journal entry for one of the quests. Also update database backup.
Death: Store initial respawn point based on initial starting location choice. Also recover all HP instead of just 1 point on respawn.
Auto-attack resources when clicked on. Fixes #123
